description: We have a range of mixed dorms which come in a variety of sizes which allows accommodating a lot of people. They range from 3 to 5 beds. There are a personal locker and a reading light by the bed. A shared bathroom is available on each floor. Bed linen is included.

Happy Hostel offers private rooms for those who need a dose of privacy and comfort. Perfect for couples or friends. Triple/Double/TwinShared or ensuite facilities. Air conditioning Luggage lockers and mini safes.

Great bathrooms on every floor with hot private showers, mirrors, hairdryers & straighteners.Rooms are freshly cleaned daily. Bed linen is included. Luggage lockers and mini safes are available for hire via reception.
